heading: HB05872
0: AN ACT MANDATING ELECTRIC DISTRIBUTION  UTILITIES TO ADOPT, IMPLEMENT AND MAINTAIN ALLOCATION OF AT LEAST THIRTY PERCENT (30%) OF THEIR ELECTRICITY SUPPLY REQUIREMENTS FROM RENEWABLE ENERGY RESOURCES, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
